biotools.summary: Software package for finding mutation regions where the input individuals are closely related, but the pedigree is not given. It takes the genotype data on a chromosome as well as the disease status for a set of input individuals without any pedigree information and outputs the predicted mutation regions.

bioschemas.name: MRD
